attributes.action: A national, no vote of confidence in the government. Grooming inquiry blocked.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to do the right thing and let the people vote again. This is a degenerate scandal and needs to be addressed. The grooming gangs can basically do what they want now. England is not a safe place for children anymore.
attributes.background: I would like there to be another general election so the people can vote Labour out.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
